Dating: OLD KINGDOM (not before); 4TH DYNASTY ?; OLD KINGDOM (not after)
Name: Limestone offering table
Description: This rectangular block in limestone constitutes a table of offerings. On its surface, a large "hetep" sign is flanked by four small rectangular bowls. The object, which probably dates from the 4th Dynasty and which comes from a tomb of El Mahasna, bears a short inscription mentioning the name and the titles of the owner.
